name: FantaSlimes
description:
Welcome to Fantaslime City, where the grass is green and the girls are pretty! An everyday slime girl, you've just moved to Fantaslime City to start anew, make friends...and maybe get a date! Will you find love? Or will things get sticky?

This game was made by three friends during the last 15 hours of SlimeJam2000! Hope u enjoy it!!
